attributes.action: ONLY ALLOW FIREWORKS DURING CELEBRATIONS/EVENTS E.G BONFIRE NIGHT,NEW YEAR'S EVE
attributes.additional_details:
PEOPLE'S PETS GETTING SCARED HIDING, RUNNING AWAY BECAUSE OF THE SOUND OF THE FIREWORKS

PEOPLE SHOULDNT BE SETTING THEM OFF UNLESS ITS A CELEBRATION AS ITS JUST NASTY TO THESE ANIMALS WHO ARE GETTING SCARED.
attributes.background: BAN PEOPLE SETTING OFF/HAVING FIREWORKS UNLESS IT IS A CELEBRATION OR EVEN LIKE BONFIRE NIGHT OR NEW YEARS EVE

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559397
